```{r, message = FALSE}
library(rstan)

options(mc.cores = parallel::detectCores())
rstan_options(auto_write = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data <- list(
  J = 8, 
  y = c(28,  8, -3,  7, -1,  1, 18, 12),
  sigma = c(15, 10, 16, 11,  9, 11, 10, 18)
)

model <- stan(file = 'solution.stan', data = data)
```

```{r}
print(model)
```

```{r}
plot(model, pars = c('eta'), show_density = TRUE)
```

```{r}
pairs(model, pars = c('mu', 'tau', 'lp__'))
```
